name: World 3-3
description: I wanted a recipe that was just straight mint and coldness. This was the result. It tastes like strong minty gum, without the pesky gum part getting in the way. The sweet strawberry is just in there to clean up the aftertaste some, you won't actually taste any strawberry at all. It is just mint and cold all the way down.
author: Proto-Jetsam

reviews.text: This stuff will be in my daily rotation now. Solid palate cleanser, thinking about adding some honey to it for times that I get sick.
